extraction_metadata.notes: This case is notable for: (1) accused was a known animal healer using prayers/charms taught by his mother, (2) extensive family testimony including 4 brothers as witnesses, (3) accusations of shape-shifting into wolf to attack animals, (4) accused claimed persecution for refusing to help hide property in church, (5) accused tried multiple times to confront his accuser but was prevented, (6) confessed under torture but later withdrew accusations against two women, (7) begged for his brothers to take care of his wife and 4 children
